Body: I have an Android 4.0.4 device Sony Xperia MT27i.When this device connects in Mac then it looks like this.(click image to enlarge)Some services are started and also it displays an unwanted screen.I've searched all the settings and tried to stop this, but no success.Please can any one help me?
Title: How to stop this type of service in Sony Xperia MT27i?

history.Text: I have Android4.0.4 device Sony Xperia MT27i.when this device connect in Mac then it's look like this.![enter image description here][1]   [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/xzxci.pngSome services are start.and also  display some un wanted screen.i search all of setting and try to stop this but i can`t success.please any one help me.Thanks
How to stop this type of service in Sony Xperia MT27i?

I have Sony Xperia MT27i running Android 4.0.4. When I connect my phone to a Mac, I get these overlays shown on the screen (as shown below).![enter image description here][1]   [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/xzxci.pngI searched for switching off these in settings but I could not succeed.
